languages.text: {n}Обведя взглядом свое скромное воинство, Комиссар вдохновенно произносит:{/n} "Во-первых, мы непрерывно прикладываем усилия к расширению наших рядов, разыскиваем невольников, в ком еще не угасли вера и готовность дать отпор нашим нечестивым пленителям. Во-вторых, мы вооружаемся и тренируемся — я преподаю соратникам основы тактики Гвардии и готовлю из них полноценное штурмовое подразделение".

{n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."
languages.original_text: {n}Обведя взглядом свое скромное воинство, Комиссар вдохновенно произносит:{/n} "Во-первых, мы непрерывно прикладываем усилия к расширению наших рядов, разыскиваем невольников, в ком еще не угасли вера и готовность дать отпор нашим нечестивым пленителям. Во-вторых, мы вооружаемся и тренируемся — я преподаю соратникам основы тактики Гвардии и готовлю из них полноценное штурмовое подразделение".

Secondly, we arm ourselves and train — I teach my comrades the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委观察着他零零散散的军队，热情地介绍着。{/n}“目前，我们的第一个目标，是寻找那些还没有失去信仰、愿意帮助我们反抗的囚犯。我们打算吸纳他们，不断壮大我们的队伍。第二个优先事项，是让我的人武装起来，进行训练。我会教导士兵帝国卫队的基本战术，让他们成为更加成熟的突击队员。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委观察着他零零散散的军队，热情地介绍着。{/n}“目前，我们的第一个目标，是寻找那些还没有失去信仰、愿意帮助我们反抗的囚犯。我们打算吸纳他们，不断壮大我们的队伍。第二个优先事项，是让我的人武装起来，进行训练。我会教导士兵帝国卫队的基本战术，让他们成为更加成熟的突击队员。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは自分の管轄下にある小規模な軍隊を見て、熱意を込めて言った。{/n}「我々の継続的な第一の目標は、まだ信念と極悪非道な看守に対抗する意思を失っていない囚人を探し出して、隊列を強化し続けることです。第二の優先事項は、武装して訓練することです――兵士たちを一人前の突撃部隊に育てるため、衛兵戦術の基本を教えています」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは自分の管轄下にある小規模な軍隊を見て、熱意を込めて言った。{/n}「我々の継続的な第一の目標は、まだ信念と極悪非道な看守に対抗する意思を失っていない囚人を探し出して、隊列を強化し続けることです。第二の優先事項は、武装して訓練することです――兵士たちを一人前の突撃部隊に育てるため、衛兵戦術の基本を教えています」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario observa a su humilde ejército y dice con entusiasmo:{/n} «Nuestro primer objetivo hasta el momento ha sido seguir aumentando nuestras filas con prisioneros que aún no han perdido la fe ni la voluntad de oponerse a nuestros perversos carceleros. La segunda prioridad es armarnos y entrenar; les enseño las tácticas básicas de la Guardia para convertir a estos soldados en una unidad de asalto como el Emperador manda».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario observa a su humilde ejército y dice con entusiasmo:{/n} «Nuestro primer objetivo hasta el momento ha sido seguir aumentando nuestras filas con prisioneros que aún no han perdido la fe ni la voluntad de oponerse a nuestros perversos carceleros. La segunda prioridad es armarnos y entrenar; les enseño las tácticas básicas de la Guardia para convertir a estos soldados en una unidad de asalto como el Emperador manda».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire promène son regard sur sa modeste armée et vous répond avec enthousiasme :{/n} « Actuellement, notre principal objectif est de gonfler nos rangs en recrutant tout prisonnier qui n'a pas encore perdu la foi et la volonté de s'opposer à nos geôliers. Notre seconde priorité est de trouver des armes et de nous entraîner. Je me charge d'enseigner à mes hommes les bases des tactiques de la Garde afin d'en faire une véritable unité d'assaut. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire promène son regard sur sa modeste armée et vous répond avec enthousiasme :{/n} « Actuellement, notre principal objectif est de gonfler nos rangs en recrutant tout prisonnier qui n'a pas encore perdu la foi et la volonté de s'opposer à nos geôliers. Notre seconde priorité est de trouver des armes et de nous entraîner. Je me charge d'enseigner à mes hommes les bases des tactiques de la Garde afin d'en faire une véritable unité d'assaut. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar betrachtet seine bescheidene Armee und sagt voller Begeisterung:{/n} "Unser erstes laufendes Ziel ist die Verstärkung unserer Reihen durch Gefangene, die den Glauben noch nicht verloren haben und bereit sind, gegen unsere ruchlosen Häscher aufzubegehren. Unsere zweite Priorität lautet Bewaffnung und Ausbildung – ich bringe meinen Soldaten die Grundlagen der Wachtaktiken bei, um sie letztlich zu einer kampfbereiten Sturmeinheit zu formen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar betrachtet seine bescheidene Armee und sagt voller Begeisterung:{/n} "Unser erstes laufendes Ziel ist die Verstärkung unserer Reihen durch Gefangene, die den Glauben noch nicht verloren haben und bereit sind, gegen unsere ruchlosen Häscher aufzubegehren. Unsere zweite Priorität lautet Bewaffnung und Ausbildung – ich bringe meinen Soldaten die Grundlagen der Wachtaktiken bei, um sie letztlich zu einer kampfbereiten Sturmeinheit zu formen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, gösterişsiz ordusuna şöyle bir göz atıp hevesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İlk hedefimiz, henüz inancını ve menfur zindancılarımıza kafa tutma isteğini kaybetmemiş mahkûmları arayıp bularak saflarımızı güçlendirmek. İkinci önceliğimizse silahlanmak ve talim yapmak. Askerlerimi tam teçhizatlı taarruz birimlerine dönüştürmek için onlara temel muhafızlık taktiklerini öğretiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar observes his humble army and says with enthusiasm,{/n} "Our first ongoing objective is to keep bolstering our ranks by seeking out prisoners who haven't yet lost faith and willingness to oppose our nefarious jailers. Our second priority is to arm ourselves and train — I teach my soldiers the basics of Guard tactics in order to mould them into a fully-fledged assault unit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser gösterişsiz ordusuna bir göz atıp hevesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İlk hedefimiz, henüz inancını ve menfur zindancılarımıza kafa tutma isteğini kaybetmemiş mahkûmları arayıp bularak saflarımızı güçlendirmek. İkinci önceliğimizse silahlanmak ve idman yapmak. Askerlerimi tam teçhizatlı taarruz birimlerine dönüştürmek için onlara Savunma taktiklerinin temellerini öğretiyorum."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
